about_the_game:
The original game "Voidship: The Long Journey" greatly updated, rehauled and extended.

The Terran Empire is in shambles and you barely escaped the onslaught. Your only mission is to reach a set of coordinates, a journey that will take several centuries. To reach your destination you´ll explore unknown sectors, gather resources, find new crew members, take important decisions to guide your people, discover new technologies, assist your allies, and defeat your enemies.

If you love exploring and battling through unknown quadrants of space with a fully customizable warship… Voidship: Redux is for you!

  • Build your own ship – Combine weapons and special modules to build a ship suited to your style of play.
  • Space travel takes time – Your travel in space takes hundreds of years, your crew will age and die. Society onboard your ship will develop according to choices you make.
  • Uniquely skilled crew members – Each person has their own strengths and weaknesses, affecting the special abilities of your ship.
  • Traditions system – Decide which principles define the surviving Terran people.
  • Complex strategic gameplay – Tactical overlay reveals your enemies weaknesses, exploit them with your special abilities.
  • Play Voidship as an RTS or a top-down shooter – At any point, you can switch between RTS or shooter control modes. RTS control mode lets you control your ship, it's modules, and any other units like an old-school real-time strategy game. Top-down shooter mode gives you more direct control in piloting your ship.
  • Real-time 2D space combat – Battle against a huge variety of unique enemy spaceships.
  • Randomly generated maps and rogue-lite gameplay – Each playthrough a new world to explore.
  • Moddable – All game scripting data is easily accessible.

SHIPBUILDING

A wide selection of modules gives you near countless ways to design your ship. Large armored and shielded dreadnaught class ships may be powerful, but become very slow and especially vulnerable in ion nebulas. A smaller speedy spaceship can kite the enemy and evade most weapons, but will have less firepower. Choose between kinetic weapons, missiles, beams, launching satellites and fighters, or less conventional means of battle like trapping enemies with tractor beams and ion weapons.

STRATEGY

The enemies in your path are quite challenging. You can pause the game and identify the weakest points of each enemy. Concentrate your weapons on a specific module to take out the engines, weapons, or repair stations to weaken your enemy. Learn from your mistakes and add countermeasures to your ship to have a better outcome in the next battle.

EXPLORATION AND THE PASSAGE OF TIME

Different factions inhabit different star systems. Based on the design of your ship you can choose to avoid the enemies you aren´t prepared for. Space travel takes time and traveling from one star system to another may take decades. Over this time your crew and your society will age and mature according to choices you make as the captain.

CHANGES BETWEEN VOIDSHIP: REDUX AND THE ORIGINAL GAME


  • 40% more content overall – Fully new game mechanics like scanning for resources and anomalies, and fully fleshed out visiting of locations on friendly space stations. New enemy ships. New events and interactions. New traditions to guide your people with. Overall just a sizeable upgrade to the amount of content in every way making for a varied replayable game.
  • Updated graphics and engine – Higher definition backgrounds and scenery. Lighting engine. 60 FPS update.
  • Bug fixes and quality of life improvements – The engine was rebuilt from the ground up and features countless small additions and fixes compared to the base game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Low tier i3 or older.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with atleast 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Low tier i5.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU with atleast 1 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Build a battleship and fight through unforgiving space to save your people. Make strategic decisions, guide your people, meet allies and foes, and battle for your right for a home. The tale of a lone spaceship on a centuries-long mission from Voidship: The Long Journey greatly enhanced and updated!
